question: Acacia catechu and Mimosa Zizyphus are found in which of the following climatic zone?
explanation: The vegetative species which are present in the Dry sub-humid zone are thorny bushes such as Acacia catechu, Mimosa Zizyphus, and sometimes fleshy Euphorbia. Other short tree varieties such as Anogeissus latifola, Soymida febrifuga are also found.
